Question
========

In a particular experiment, patients are assigned to one of three groups. The three groups follow a diet and after end of the diet, their cholesterol levels are measured. To test whether the population averages of cholesterol levels in the three groups are equal to each other we use a

Answerlist
----------

* Pooled T-test
* Regression analysis
* Paired T-test
* CRD-ANOVA

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Pooled t-test: Incorrect
* Regression analysis: Incorrect
* Paired t-test: Incorrect
* CRD-ANOVA: Correct
